column1: Américo Brasiliense is a Brazilian municipality in the state of São Paulo. The population is 38
column2: 202 (2015 est.) in an area of 123 km².This city is also known as Cidade Doçura ("sweetness city")
column3: because its perimeter is surrounded by sugar cane plantations
column4: which form the basis for its economy.  This is supported by cheap labor from emigrants from northeastern states
